Enum EFFECT_TRANSITION_SPEED¶

  • Defined in File dm_fx_effects_defines.h

Enum Documentation¶

enum EFFECT_TRANSITION_SPEED¶

: Transition time when new parameters are loaded

Values:

TRANS_VERY_FAST = (1)¶

< 1 ms

TRANS_FAST = (5)¶

~ 3 ms

TRANS_MED = (10)¶

~ 6 ms

TRANS_SLOW = (40)¶

~ 25 ms

TRANS_VERY_SLOW = (120)¶

~ 80 ms

TRANS_TOTAL¶
